item.title: About/now
item.description: About this site This is a test/experimental static site, generated by hugo, written in markdown, mathematics written in LaTeX rendered by MathJax, and kindly freely hosted by GitHub. Now Now I am doing something I do not quite understand. Trying to prove things, or write other things. Need to do: Add papers (and write some, hence)

item.title: privacy
item.description: Privacy policy I do not gather any information from visitors. Embedded links from google or youtube or vimeo might do, instead. Please check their privacy policies before clicking.

item.title: Argomenti di Geometria e Topologia - AA 2016-17
item.description: prova Sempre caro mi fu quest'ermo colle E questa siepe, che da tanta parte il guardo esclude.
